long_description: The Julbo Solan girls' sunglasses protect the eyes of young adventurers who spend just as much time outside as mom and dad. Free of finger-pinching hinges, these have flexible temples that let kids pull the sunglasses on and off repeatedly without damaging the frames. Rubber temple inserts help keep glasses securely on a child's face. Spectron 3 polycarbonate lenses block 100% of UV rays and 87% of visible light, reducing glare and creating a clear image. Flash treatment to lenses reinforces the filtering of visible light through a mirror effect; anti-glare treatment to lenses eliminates glare reflections. Lightweight polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and less than one-third the weight. Julbo Solan sunglasses include a soft microfiber storage pouch. Best fits kids ages 4 - 6 years old.
short_description: The Julbo Solan girls' sunglasses protect the eyes of young adventurers who spend just as much time outside as mom and dad.
